name: Decaying Implosion
desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for 40% in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by 10%, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by 20%.
enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for 40% in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by 15%, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by 30%.
